video.title: MacGyver
video.synopsis: Using brains, finesse and a lot of duct tape, a former special ops agent brings down corrupt dictators and other bad guys in this classic action show.

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver races against time -- and a government missile -- to rescue a team of scientists trapped in an underground lab after a mysterious explosion.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: On a mission in Burma, MacGyver is taken prisoner after he happens upon a military operation that's using farmers as slave labor in the opium fields.
episodes.title: The Golden Triangle

episodes.synopsis: In Hungary, MacGyver arranges to meet a Russian double agent with some sensitive information. But when he ends up dead, the information is stolen.
episodes.title: Thief of Budapest

episodes.synopsis: It's up to MacGyver to get a photographer out of harm's way after she snaps photos of a Latin American dictator with an international arms dealer.
episodes.title: The Gauntlet

episodes.synopsis: When a casino owner steals a fortune in diamonds meant for a charity auction, MacGyver has a plan to get them back -- aided by a senator's daughter.
episodes.title: The Heist

episodes.synopsis: An expedition to the Amazon turns potentially deadly when MacGyver discovers a colony of carnivorous army ants on the march in the rain forest.
episodes.title: Trumbo's World

episodes.synopsis: A planned vacation turns into an unwanted adventure when MacGyver arrives at a small regional airport that's been taken over by bad guys.
episodes.title: Last Stand

episodes.synopsis: After MacGyver helps a pair of longtime friends strike oil, he must contend with the resulting fire as it burns out of control.
episodes.title: Hellfire

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver gets more than he bargained for when he plays protector to a man who intends to testify against his mob-connected brother.
episodes.title: The Prodigal

episodes.synopsis: After returning from a mission in the Middle East, MacGyver learns that his latest deed of derring-do has earned him a contract on his life.
episodes.title: Target MacGyver

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver is captured by enemy agents who inject him with a hallucinatory drug that will kill him in six hours if he doesn't do as he's told.
episodes.title: Nightmares

episodes.synopsis: Taken to a safe house for debriefing, MacGyver finds himself and fellow agents prisoners of an enemy who's rigged the place as a potential deathtrap.
episodes.title: Deathlock

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver has to help a longtime friend who believes someone is out to kill her after she uncovers a theft at a nuclear processing plant.
episodes.title: Flame's End

episodes.synopsis: When a mad bomber targets a luxury cruise ship, MacGyver teams with fellow Vietnam veteran Charlie Robinson to save the day.
episodes.title: Countdown

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver hopes for some downtime but is instead charged with protecting a Russian defector who may be able to uncover a mole in the organization.
episodes.title: The Enemy Within

episodes.synopsis: Hoping to make a quiet exit from Bulgaria, MacGyver crosses paths with a lovely but troublesome young woman who promptly frames him as a jewel thief.
episodes.title: Every Time She Smiles

episodes.synopsis: Wounded and on the run in Afghanistan, MacGyver takes refuge with an Afghan woman and her son. As danger closes in, they make a break for Pakistan.
episodes.title: To Be a Man

episodes.synopsis: An ill-fated visit to a former professor leaves MacGyver looking after a teenage hacker with inside information about a missile defense system.
episodes.title: Ugly Duckling

episodes.synopsis: In the Middle East, MacGyver boards a train and ends up a hostage when a tribal chief -- who wants justice for his son's death -- takes over by force.
episodes.title: Slow Death

episodes.synopsis: In North Africa, MacGyver finds it hard to say no when he's asked to help a young woman -- but soon learns that what she wants him to do is illegal.
episodes.title: The Escape

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver and Thornton discover that a longtime friend, a Soviet dissident who's been reported dead, is locked away in a Russian mental asylum.
episodes.title: A Prisoner of Conscience

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver foils a master assassin out to kill an archbishop, but the enemy proves elusive -- and every bit the resourceful improviser that MacGyver is.
episodes.title: The Assassin

episodes.synopsis: While MacGyver is checking out a new high-tech security system at a military base, the computer traps him inside and attempts to kill him.
episodes.title: The Human Factor

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver is tricked into believing that he is helping a man find his son. But in reality, MacGyver is unknowingly leading a hit man to his target.
episodes.title: The Eraser

episodes.synopsis: A friend of MacGyver's becomes suicidal after being swindled out of his life savings. MacGyver orchestrates a reverse scam to get the money back.
episodes.title: Twice Stung

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver rescues a boy in Chinatown who is mixed up with some scam artists presenting him as the Wish Child, a legendary mystical Chinese boy.
episodes.title: The Wish Child

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver and four youths are stranded in the wilderness after their plane crashes. Gang rivalries among the youth escalate the precarious situation.
episodes.title: Final Approach

episodes.synopsis: Jack Dalton asks for MacGyver's help in rescuing a botanist in Central America. Once there, MacGyver finds out that the botanist is an old friend.
episodes.title: Jack of Lies

episodes.synopsis: A nun and some orphans need rescue from murderous soldiers in Southeast Asia. The nun's assistant turns out to be an old girlfriend of MacGyver's.
episodes.title: The Road Not Taken

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver helps two rare golden eagles facing extinction. He must simultaneously confront the poacher trying to kill the eagles and eliminate MacGyver.
episodes.title: Eagles

episodes.synopsis: A teacher of the deaf is plagued by nightmares. MacGyver thinks these unexplained dreams are connected to a plan to hijack a missile-guidance system.
episodes.title: Silent World

episodes.synopsis: Stranded, MacGyver hitches a ride with a retired couple. Unknowingly, they are in possession of counterfeit money that the mob is trying to recover.
episodes.title: Three for the Road

episodes.synopsis: When MacGyver and his grandfather stop by the Phoenix Foundation for tickets to a hockey game, they discover terrorists attempting to blow up a bomb.
episodes.title: Phoenix Under Siege

episodes.synopsis: A former agent seeking revenge kidnaps a woman and her son. MacGyver is tasked with the mission of rescuing them.
episodes.title: Family Matter

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver helps a Russian defector seek asylum in the U.S. Meanwhile, Penny Parker accidentally uncovers an assassination plot of a foreign official.
episodes.title: Soft Touch

episodes.synopsis: A pregnant woman is on the run from her husband who wants her dead. MacGyver becomes trapped with her in an abandoned factory as her delivery nears.
episodes.title: Birth Day

episodes.synopsis: An archaeologist is kidnapped by pirates to help them find $60 million in sunken treasure at the bottom of the sea. MacGyver must attempt a rescue.
episodes.title: Pirates

episodes.synopsis: A mob informant hides some microfilm on MacGyver, who is on a ski vacation. An avalanche prevents the mob from getting to MacGyver, but not for long.
episodes.title: Out in the Cold

episodes.synopsis: While MacGyver is at the viewing of his friend Jack Dalton, two CIA agents gone bad show up to make sure Jack is dead.
episodes.title: Dalton, Jack of Spies

episodes.synopsis: A master-of-disguise hit man, whom MacGyver thought long dead, shows up seeking revenge. This causes MacGyver to flashback to their first encounter.
episodes.title: Partners

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver is sent to rescue a pilot in a Central American country. Matters become complicated when the pilot's daughter stows away on the mission.
episodes.title: Bushmaster

episodes.synopsis: A surprise birthday party is thrown for MacGyver at the Phoenix Foundation, causing him to reflect on old friends and memories.
episodes.title: Friends

episodes.synopsis: A head injury causing amnesia makes MacGyver forget about his recent discovery of a bomb planted at a funeral. Will MacGyver's memory return in time?
episodes.title: DOA: MacGyver

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver and an agent he despises pose as a married couple to infiltrate a psychiatric hospital in Czechoslovakia to free a human rights activist.
episodes.title: For Love or Money

episodes.synopsis: Soviet agents use a former lover of MacGyver's, whom he thought to be dead, as a pawn to steal a valuable Chinese jade dragon statue.
episodes.title: Lost Love: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver steals back the jade dragon statue to free his former lover being held captive. However, it turns out she may be working with the Russians.
episodes.title: Lost Love: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: A man MacGyver helped put into the witness protection program has been spotted by the mob and they want him back -- or else.
episodes.title: Back From the Dead

episodes.synopsis: While mapping wilderness in Alaska, MacGyver discovers an abandoned ship. On it, a Russian stowaway tells him the crew was scared off -- by Bigfoot!
episodes.title: Ghost Ship

episodes.synopsis: A friend of MacGyver's is killed by a diamond thief with diplomatic immunity. The friend's sister teams with MacGyver to get the diplomat deported.
episodes.title: Fire and Ice

episodes.synopsis: An experimental U.S. fighter jet is shot down over East Germany and MacGyver is sent in to demolish the wreckage before the Soviets reach it.
episodes.title: GX-1

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver and Jack Dalton are arrested and sent to a prison camp where they are forced to dig in an abandoned mine for hidden millions of dollars.
episodes.title: Jack in the Box

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver's best friend falls to her death while mountain climbing with him. MacGyver has no time to mourn when Murdoc shows up looking for revenge.
episodes.title: The Widowmaker

episodes.synopsis: After failing to win a physics competition, the son of MacGyver's mentor locks himself in a lab with a homemade bomb.
episodes.title: Hell Week

episodes.synopsis: A terrorist wants Nikki Carpenter dead. MacGyver searches through Nikki's old records to find out who would want to kill her and why.
episodes.title: Blow Out

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver discovers that a genetic experiment mutated in space and now ages animals at a vast rate. The scientist in charge doesn't want to destroy it.
episodes.title: Kill Zone

episodes.synopsis: A deadly explosion involving a nuclear warhead causes Pete to retire. MacGyver suspects Pete's replacement is responsible for sabotaging the warhead.
episodes.title: Early Retirement

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver returns to Minnesota to help his old hockey coach take his high school team to the state championships.
episodes.title: Thin Ice

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver and Jack accompany a rich woman and her recently acquired jewels on a flight to France. However, when they land, they are arrested for theft.
episodes.title: The Odd Triple

episodes.synopsis: When MacGyver's research threatens to cause a shutdown of a marina project, the owner hires a beautiful woman to persuade MacGyver to change his mind.
episodes.title: The Negotiator

episodes.synopsis: A man who witnessed toxic waste dumping has vital testimony for MacGyver and Pete. But his flashbacks to his time in Vietnam cause him to be unstable.
episodes.title: The Spoilers

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver and Jack Dalton help an American Indian find a sacred wolf mask. However, two mercenaries abduct him to get the mask for themselves.
episodes.title: Mask of the Wolf

episodes.synopsis: Jack Dalton and MacGyver suddenly become dads when a baby is left in Jack's airplane hangar. The mother claims that Jack is the father.
episodes.title: Rock the Cradle

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver reunites with an old girlfriend who is a park ranger at an animal preserve. Their reunion is complicated by a battle they have with poachers.
episodes.title: The Endangered

episodes.synopsis: The only heir of a rich Chinese shipping magnate is living in a monastery. MacGyver enlists his help to fight a criminal takeover of the business.
episodes.title: Murderer's Sky

episodes.synopsis: Penny Parker asks MacGyver to accompany her in inspecting an old house that she inherited from her aunt, an apparently haunted house.
episodes.title: The Secret of Parker House

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver returns to his hometown to find himself haunted by the memories of a fatal shooting accident when he was a kid.
episodes.title: Blood Brothers

episodes.synopsis: After being rescued by an Amish family, MacGyver helps the community confront a construction crew that is trying to force them off their land.
episodes.title: The Outsiders

episodes.synopsis: Pete is taken prisoner during a coup d'état by the rebels in Barraca. MacGyver must enlist Jack to help rescue Pete.
episodes.title: On a Wing and a Prayer

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver takes the place of a Phoenix Foundation race car driver when the driver is blinded. A ruthless ex-rival of MacGyver's is also in the race.
episodes.title: Collision Course

episodes.synopsis: In the wilderness, MacGyver and Pete discover a crashed DEA plane and have to deal with the deadly drug smugglers responsible for sabotaging it.
episodes.title: The Survivors

episodes.synopsis: An escaped killer whom MacGyver is searching for is actually the pawn of a mastermind criminal who is still locked up and planning revenge.
episodes.title: Deadly Dreams

episodes.synopsis: Jack Dalton discovers his long-lost mother is a fugitive, with the police, a bounty hunter and a corrupt government official on her trail.
episodes.title: Ma Dalton

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver's friend Penny Parker gets the lead part in a new musical. MacGyver suspects it may be a set up by his archnemesis to trap him.
episodes.title: Cleo Rocks

episodes.synopsis: Pete is conflicted when he discovers that the Phoenix Foundation employee selling classified information turns out to be his son.
episodes.title: Fraternity of Thieves

episodes.synopsis: When the young son of MacGyver's co-worker is kidnapped, MacGyver must go and retrieve the boy from the house of the boy's uncle, a powerful mob boss.
episodes.title: The Battle of Tommy Giordano

episodes.synopsis: An ex-gang member gets into trouble with the police and a shop owner. With MacGyver's help, he unravels an anti-Semitic community in the neighborhood.
episodes.title: The Challenge

episodes.synopsis: As MacGyver helps a teenage prostitute leave her pimp and return to her family, it is revealed that she is also being abused by her father.
episodes.title: Runners

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver suspects a U.S. soldier in the theft of gold from a downed World War II plane in the Arctic.
episodes.title: Gold Rush

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver takes some Phoenix Foundation employees for a trip into the wilderness but learns that someone in the group might be an escaped criminal.
episodes.title: The Invisible Killer

episodes.synopsis: An awards ceremony given by an African nation for help received from MacGyver and Jack is the setting of an assassination plot of the nation's leader.
episodes.title: Brainwashed

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver and Pete Thornton are taken hostage by a terrorist group that intends to hit a city with an electromagnetic pulse weapon.
episodes.title: Easy Target

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver must stop an ex-Navy SEAL, who once saved his life, from using a stolen vial of anthrax.
episodes.title: Renegade

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver, Jack and Pete go on a gold-panning expedition. Unfortunately, a woman from MacGyver's past stalks them and has murderous intentions.
episodes.title: Unfinished Business

episodes.synopsis: An archaeologist friend pays MacGyver a visit to get his help in using a map to find an ancient artifact called the Holy Rose.
episodes.title: The Legend of the Holy Rose: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver and his archaeologist friend continue on to London and France in their search for the Holy Rose.
episodes.title: The Legend of the Holy Rose: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: A female defector who is a witness to a murder is protected by the Phoenix Foundation. She also holds the key to the location of a priceless necklace.
episodes.title: The Black Corsage

episodes.synopsis: While in Geneva, MacGyver is wounded in an assassination attempt. He is framed as the sniper and meets a schoolgirl who helps him clear his name.
episodes.title: Cease Fire

episodes.synopsis: Rogue American servicemen steal everything that's not nailed down in Thailand, creating a life-threatening situation. MacGyver helps set things right.
episodes.title: Second Chance

episodes.synopsis: Murdoc enlists MacGyver's help to rescue his sister from his former employer. She is scheduled to be executed by a professional assassination group.
episodes.title: Halloween Knights

episodes.synopsis: When a Chinese college student shows up at MacGyver's front door, she brings with her a continuation of the struggle that began in Tiananmen Square.
episodes.title: Children of Light

episodes.synopsis: In Africa, MacGyver witnesses the cruel slaughter of the endangered black rhino and joins a group of activists hoping to prevent the poaching.
episodes.title: Black Rhino

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver uncovers a massive neo-Nazi movement within the American political system after he investigates the claims by a holocaust survivor.
episodes.title: The Ten Percent Solution

episodes.synopsis: A series of accidents that occur during the filming of a music video convinces a rock star friend of MacGyver's that her sister is trying to kill her.
episodes.title: Two Times Trouble

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver and the kids at the Challenge Center are taught the true meaning of Christmas by a mysterious homeless woman who comes to stay there.
episodes.title: The Madonna

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver dreams that he is in the Old West, where he encounters Murdoc and Pete, who conspire to force MacGyver off his land.
episodes.title: Serenity

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver is mentoring a troubled high school student who discovers that a construction site may be unsafe when he witnesses an inspector being bribed.
episodes.title: Live and Learn

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver goes undercover as a logger in the Pacific Northwest in order to expose the illegal practices of a Japanese businessman.
episodes.title: Log Jam

episodes.synopsis: A friend of MacGyver's is killed in Peru looking for a mythical treasure. MacGyver helps his daughter to continue her father's quest.
episodes.title: The Treasure of Manco

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver organizes a gambling sting operation in order to catch the murderer of a horse trainer, a money launderer for a Cuban drug lord.
episodes.title: Jenny's Chance

episodes.synopsis: A scientist designs a new sonar detection system for the Phoenix Foundation.  A submarine company owner wants to sell the system to a drug cartel.
episodes.title: Deep Cover

episodes.synopsis: A famous musician is kidnapped by criminals who want a priceless violin as the ransom. A young woman enlists MacGyver's help to defeat the crooks.
episodes.title: The Lost Amadeus

episodes.synopsis: Disgruntled steel mill workers kidnap the daughter of the industrialist who put them out of work.
episodes.title: Hearts of Steel

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver is serving as a sequestered jury member in a racially charged trial. He sneaks out to investigate the crime scene, uncovering new evidence.
episodes.title: Rush to Judgement

episodes.synopsis: In a coma after a serious fall, MacGyver has a near-death experience, where he is reunited with his grandfather and his long-deceased parents.
episodes.title: Passages

episodes.synopsis: A gang of young vigilantes is destroying the city's crack houses. MacGyver suspects an ex-Marine from the youth center as the person training them.
episodes.title: Tough Boys

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver appeals to bring secret files to public view but collides with an elite corpsman loyal to Romania's dead tyrant Ceausescu.
episodes.title: Humanity

episodes.synopsis: When a cop is shot, a gun used to assassinate a politician years ago is found. MacGyver's friend from the youth center is accused of the crime.
episodes.title: The Gun

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver steps in to help his teenage friend Lisa when she's found passed out drunk at a crime scene and becomes a suspect in a string of burglaries.
episodes.title: Twenty Questions

episodes.synopsis: An elderly German man is reunited with his long-lost granddaughter. However, she is now an agent involved in a plot to steal her grandfather's gold.
episodes.title: The Wall

episodes.synopsis: The infamous Dr. Zito escapes from court during his insanity hearing. MacGyver and the police are now the victims of Zito's sadistic games.
episodes.title: Lesson in Evil

episodes.synopsis: Harry's will leaves a vintage car to MacGyver. However, a gang of crooks want the vehicle, believing a priceless diamond pendant is hidden inside.
episodes.title: Harry's Will

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver is accused of having a fear of commitment by the women in his life. A dream takes him back to the Old West with its mail-order brides.
episodes.title: MacGyver's Women

episodes.synopsis: A farm-worker organizer who uncovered evidence against growers using deadly pesticides is found dead. MacGyver goes undercover to investigate.
episodes.title: Bitter Harvest

episodes.synopsis: While driving through a small town, MacGyver sees something resembling a UFO landing and starts to investigate.
episodes.title: The Visitor

episodes.synopsis: Mama Colton, MacGyver and the daughter of a baseball legend join forces to take down a group of criminals that produces counterfeit baseball cards.
episodes.title: Squeeze Play

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver reunites with his high school sweetheart at an international sports competition, which is being sponsored by the woman's abusive husband.
episodes.title: Jerico Games

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver arrives at a wasteland test site owned by Phoenix Foundation where he finds an envelope containing an audio cassette and instructions.
episodes.title: The Wasteland

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver is helping archaeologists to find the tomb of Alexander the Great but soon learns that they are not the only ones out there looking for it.
episodes.title: Eye of Osiris

episodes.synopsis: Earl Dent's been paroled and asks MacGyver for help. Some of his former associates want Earl to take them to someone who betrayed them.
episodes.title: High Control

episodes.synopsis: Two guys whack a priest in the head with a metal pipe, drag him into a construction site and rob him of everything valuable. MacGyver investigates.
episodes.title: There But for the Grace

episodes.synopsis: While Pete is looking at sketches of the suspects at a crime scene, MacGyver notices that he has trouble with his vision.
episodes.title: Blind Faith

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver steps into a bear trap in the woods while tracking a wolf. Luckily for him, two friendly elderly sisters take him home and take care of him.
episodes.title: Faith, Hope and Charity

episodes.synopsis: After his sister dies, Murdoc decides to resume working for his old employer. In order to regain their trust, he has to take on MacGyver once again.
episodes.title: Strictly Business

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver tries to help an American Indian lawyer who's going to court to prevent a power company from building just outside the tribe's sacred land.
episodes.title: Trail of Tears

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver visits Pete Thornton in the hospital, where Pete is to have eye surgery. They talk and reminisce about their many adventures together.
episodes.title: Hind-Sight

episodes.synopsis: A man in security guard uniform, carrying a briefcase, enters a hangar alone, where he steals a top secret stealth helicopter operating manual.
episodes.title: Honest Abe

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver arrives at a new neighborhood filled with weirdos, surfer dudes, roller girls and two rich old men who have nefarious plans for the hood.
episodes.title: The 'Hood

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver is obsessed with Murdoc's death and believes that he's still alive because of his nightmares and mysterious phone calls that he receives.
episodes.title: Obsessed

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver blames himself when an old friend is killed while investigating a mysterious series of fires set by a crazed arsonist called Prometheus.
episodes.title: The Prometheus Syndrome

episodes.synopsis: The Colton brothers combine their individual talents to create a formidable team of world-class bounty hunters.
episodes.title: The Coltons

episodes.synopsis: Scum exiled from Haiti has settled down in Little Haiti in MacGyver's neighborhood. They are selling drugs and collecting protection payments.
episodes.title: Walking Dead

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver discovers his family name was disgraced during the Middle Ages. He is then knocked unconscious and transported to the time of King Arthur.
episodes.title: Good Knight MacGyver: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: After outwitting the evil Sir Duncan and escaping the clutches of Morgana, MacGyver and Merlin search for the kidnapped Cecilia.
episodes.title: Good Knight MacGyver: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Two masked men invade a silent-film star's house and take his films. Can MacGyver retrieve them?
episodes.title: Deadly Silents

episodes.synopsis: Earl Dent is out of money and wants to go pro at boxing. He enlists MacGyver as his coach.
episodes.title: Split Decision

episodes.synopsis: Rival street gangs in MacGyver's neighborhood are recruiting teenagers to sell crack to get money to buy guns with which to wipe out their rivals.
episodes.title: Gunz 'N Boyz

episodes.synopsis: A businessman is upset because he has bought a slum area and wants to tear it down but can't because an old lady is contesting the eviction notice.
episodes.title: Off the Wall

episodes.synopsis: MacGyver and his young Chinese friend are again at odds with Chinese criminals over labor regulations.
episodes.title: The Stringer

episodes.synopsis: A prophecy predicts that a resourceful man (MacGyver) follows another man (Dalton) to a community that is supposed to hold the Fountain of Youth.
episodes.title: The Mountain of Youth
